name: YouTube Black 2-Column
description:
Warning this needs work and not every page has been re-styled. But if you want a black version of the new YouTube design, with 2 column front display then look no future. Fork this style and modify it to your hearts content.

I will be making updates to the style for all the pages, in the coming weeks as I am using this for my personal use as well.

Enjoy!

user.name: Nextrix
user.about:
Web Developer/Designer, Artist, Programmer, Technology Enthusiast, Gamer, Geek. I go by the name "Nextrix" on many internet sites and video game communities. The internet and video games industry are two very important parts in my life, as I'm always try to stay on top of both. One I do for a career choice, and the other for a hobby/future career choice.

I've been working as a Web Designer/Developer since 1998. It first started as a hobby of mine. Now I develop websites professionally. I've worked on many large websites such as, Stella Atrois, Ken Dryden, The Mississauga News, BiC, and now Humber College. My focus for the past 5 years has been focused on being a professional Drupal (Content Management System) web developer and designer. 

I'm also the creator and owner of MinecraftTextures.com, as well as some other TBA projects.
